text: During the surveillance period 22,185 pooled samples were collected from 459 LBM distributed between 48 provinces (242 districts) ( Table 3) . Each LBM was visited between 1 and 28 times (median 4 visits), providing a total of 3,461 market days for analysis. Sampling intensity was highest in Round 1 and decreased thereafter ( Table 3) . In general, sampled provinces were evenly distributed throughout the country although sampling in Rounds 2-4 provided more homogenous coverage of Vietnam than Rounds 1 and 6, with the latter exhibiting a slight north-south emphasis.
